fields.label: Products per page
fields.name: global_woocommerce_products_on_page
fields.instructions: Choose how many products to display per shop pages

fields.label: Set fixed on scroll?
fields.name: global_woocommerce_header_menu_fixed
fields.instructions: You can attach header navigation on top

fields.label: Use blank padding under header?
fields.name: global_woocommerce_header_add_cap
fields.instructions: We recommend use this setting for transparent and fixed header navigation

fields.label: Header menu height
fields.name: global_woocommerce_header_menu_height
fields.instructions: You can change header menu height

fields.label: Add subheader?
fields.name: global_woocommerce_header_menu_add_contacts_bar
fields.instructions: Append bar with phone nums, social links and other info to shop pages

fields.label: Subheader style
fields.name: global_woocommerce_header_menu_contacts_bar_style
fields.instructions: Choose style type for shop pages

fields.label: Subtitle
fields.name: global_woocommerce_header_subtitle
fields.instructions: Leave blank if you want to not display value

fields.label: Add background overlay color?
fields.name: global_woocommerce_header_use_overlay
fields.instructions: Add transparent overlay color for background image

fields.label: Header height
fields.name: global_woocommerce_header_height
fields.instructions: You can change header height. Set new CSS value

fields.label: Hide header title section
fields.name: global_woocommerce_header_use_hero
fields.instructions: Remove title section from shop pages

fields.label: Attach background image?
fields.name: global_woocommerce_page_background_is_attached
fields.instructions: You can fix background image on all shop pages

fields.label: Show breadcrumbs
fields.name: global_woocommerce_page_show_breadcrumbs
fields.instructions: Show breadcrumbs section on shop page?

fields.label: Show shop pages in boxed wrapper?
fields.name: global_woocommerce_use_boxed_wrapper
fields.instructions: Put pages in boxed content wrapper

fields.label: Footer background image
fields.name: global_woocommerce_footer_background_image
fields.instructions: We recommend the use of transparent image for the background

fields.label: Use footer as sticky?
fields.name: global_woocommerce_footer_is_sticky
fields.instructions: You can sticky footer on shop pages

fields.label: Hide footer?
fields.name: global_woocommerce_footer_hide
fields.instructions: Hide footer block from all shop pages

fields.label: Show copyright section?
fields.name: global_woocommerce_footer_show_copyright_section
fields.instructions: You can show/hide copyright on shop pages
